content.detailedDescription: Came home with wife from a play got out of car ,noticed flash in sky. flash lsted 4 to 6 seconds,long enough for me to make notice. as it faded saw small star like dot moving moving out of west sky.Then it slowly started getting bright again. did this 3 times after last time just disappeard from view. lite was very high in sky. seemed higher than most satellites or was much smaller. wondering if any one else saw this event on 9-8-13, in warwick,ri at 9:20pm or there abouts. wife saw lite also
content.summary: Star like,faint,then would slowly go from dull then bright

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on lester rd in apopka, fl. it was about 7:35pm the sun was setting behind me and you could see the sunlight on the tips of the clouds to my east. out of nowhere a bright light was ascending upwards leaving a light trail and you could see the clouds bending around it. there wasn't a clear view because it never came out of the clouds. it was if it was on the edge of the clouds. i lost sight because was stopped at a stop sign and a car came behind me and once i turned i lost sight of it. i was shocked because i could see it very clearly the light and the light trail it was leaving. i have a video but its very blurry due to the auto focus would not lock in on it.
content.summary: Saw a bright object ascending leaving a light trail and bending the clouds around it.

content.detailedDescription: This event happened in 91 or 92...I have never talked about it until just recently with my family, we live in wise county in texas, we also live on 5 acres in the country, myself and my two daughters were sitting outside on our back porch one night around 9:30ish playing with our new kittens only a couple months old, all the sudden from the corner of my eye on the east side of our house i see these 4 objects shaped like diamonds or kites whichever you want to choose, they were a very pretty red color, and one of them was bigger then the other 3, and they stay close together hovering low, maybe treetop, but they were not huge like a spaceship, they come around to directly face us {now facing south} stop and it almost seems like watching us for a few seconds, although i could not see inside the object it just felt like that, i guess you could say i was not believing what i was seeing, i tell my oldest daughter to run get the camera, when she comes back out they have moved over to the other side of our house now west, and just sit there a few seconds, she tried to take a picture but it did not work, i think she was just nervous and did not wind it because it was not a digital camera...Then they move back south and go out a little ways onto the property that backs up to ours, still just hovering, then they spread out, sit there a few seconds, then ascend into the sky {never making a sound this whole time} and just like that they are gone...They never twirl, or spin just kind of move this way and that...Left, right, up, down. i read about y'all on youtube so came here to your site to tell this story, i always wondered if anyone else saw them that night and maybe reported it, i never did, and would not have known who to contact anyway, so here is my story, it may be to old to be of any interest to y'all, but thought i would tell it anyway.
content.summary: Hovering low, saw on east side of my house first, moved and stopped 3 times then ascended and gone.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving at 01:50 in the morning after the bills game and when i was on 90 west 68 miles from pa i noticed a massive red light coming at me. then once the front light passed me i saw another light on my far right and another one slightly to my left going over me. i noticed from the base of the lights that the craft was a flat black and not making any noise. also that the craft was going about 60-80 miles an hour 90 east over the tree tops. i first thought it was a stealth bomber but because it was so low and made no noise or that it could even fly at that low of speeds is crazy. i'm just mad that i didn't just pull over a chased the thing and take pictures. i'm just reporting this just incase anybody else saw the same thing that night.
content.summary: Black massive triangle 3 red light craft on 90 west from buffalo

content.detailedDescription:
I was awake early and stood on my balcony to watch the sunrise and noticed 2 shining objects which i thought may be satelites and so i took a picture of both before the sun came over the horizon.
when the sub rose over the horizon, it was not possible to see either one.
when i look at one photo, the object looks possibly saucer shaped and the other is difficult to decipher.
perhaps with a better viewer enhancer there will be a better shape.
one last picture (4) is just before the sunrise.
content.summary: 2 separate objects at sunrise a distance apart. both different shapes.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home about 9:15 pm on march 18th 2013, i was heading south on pch. i stopped in turn lane at latigo canyon to make left and had to wait for oncoming traffic. while i was waiting something caught my eye by beach. i thought i saw a boat on fire. i then was able to turn. i pulled over as soon as possible and grabbed my cell, shut off car. i was going to call 9-11 to report fire but then realized it wasn't a boat.

i then proceeded to witness these bright round orbs coming up out of water, the first two went apx 100 feet in air then turned and came directly over me and continued into mountains. the remaining seven once arriving at same altitude, heading north straight up coastline. i was in such shock it didn't occur to me to start taking pictures until the first two were gone. ( i was quite scared) i then began trying to video tape them but my camera kept shutting off. i have many one minute and less videos and a few still pictures.

it seemed they changed or morphed into a bigger brighter orbs while changing color. as i was parked i started witnessing other cars pulling over and jumping out to record this event on their cell phones.

the two that went over my head seemed to be round orbs with a liquid looking plasma substance that was turning within it? it's hard to explain since i have never seen anything quite like it. i admit i started to panic when i realized they were coming straight towards me. the second i realized they were not " spaceships" i felt calmer. i have no clue what these are and would love your experts to look at film. i witnessed something that i can not explain, and it's driving me crazy. thank you for having a place to report these sightings it took a while to find you, but i'm happy i told somebody finally.
content.summary: Watched orbs come out of pacific ocean one by one, then watched as two went east, seven went north along beach

content.detailedDescription:
With two friends at restaurant in rockville md, after 9:30pm. i was facing street. over my friends head i notice something over buildings but was blurry, like transparent. i told my friends but the joke about, than on my right side i see it again and one friend got a glimpse. my other friend had his back and moved quick his neck and complain the pain and didn't see... we paid attention to him for that split second and the ship was gone...
there was no color, or reflection, or sound. just a big thing semi- visible.
had not windows i think but something like square patterns in front and the back kind of look the same or different design. shape i saw flat maybe some smooth curve in front and back... cant be sure... was hard to look since you could see the background in some areas.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ouside restaurant at rt350, huge ufo with transparency open over tall buildins, disappear and show up again other direction leaving, slow and diappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in my backyard hammock looking at the stars, satellites and aircraft approaching newark airport with my binoculars. aircraft were approaching from rhe west and southwest going east and then banking north and lowering to the airport. between i would say 8 and 9 pm a small probably a commercial or private jet about 2000 ft up past over my house from the north and flew south. i put the binoculars on it for a few seconds and as i lowered them i saw a object with just my eyes behind, above and to the left of the jet. i immediately put the binocs  on it and i see it is a disc shaped object with what looked small lights all around it's edge. it looked about  the size of a small two engine jet liner. it made no sound and just kept going in a straight line until it was out of sight. 

i was shocked, i thought damn it is a flying saucer. i felt excited, i knew we are not alone here. it seemed so natural all of a sudden, i did not feel fear at all. i thought ok what do i do now, who do i tell? i went in told my wife and called my son. i decided to contact you and make this report. i am one of millions that report things like this i know. won't do much good, but i know what i saw.  they are here and i know it for sure now.
content.summary: Observed disc following jet aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Let my dog out in my garden as i looked up the first flash caught my eye then 5 seconds later another very bright flash lit up the sky.It was about ten times as bright and large as the nearest star which was easy to see as there was no clouds don't know what this was i have never seen anything like this i hope someone has seen something similar as i would love to know what this was.
content.summary: 2 bright lights flashed about 5 seconds appart no noise but lit up sky

content.detailedDescription:
09/05/13 at 10:00 pm. i was sober, 100% sober.  this sighting happened in alamo, it's possible that it could have been over walnut creek too. i walked out onto the deck of the back yard with the lights off.  i had a creepy feeling like someone was in the bushes so i went back in and turned the light on. i walked out and went all the way to the end which is the length of the house.  i turned around and started walking back to the other end of the deck when i see it just over the tree tops. we have tall trees all around so it could not be too far away. i was dumbstruck at what i saw and immediately thought it was not man made. 

it was a boomerang shape, but reminded me of a nintendo game controller.  so it had a u shape curve at the front, but had stuff in the middle.  i thought it was translucent with a blue glow over the whole thing.  there was one white light on each end of the arms.  there seemed to be a red/orange faint hue at a large circle at the front center curved part, but it didn't stay on. 

i stood there for at least 40 seconds while it did not make a move or make a sound.  when i was sure i was looking at something i could not explain, i screamed for my mom to come outside and check it out. i was very excited and loud about it, waving my arms trying to get her to hustle. as soon as i yelled for her the craft began to move very slowly. it was almost done changing shape by the time she was able to look.

it seemed like the two arms, the ends with the white lights began to move towards each other. if you put your arms straight out in front of your and begin to move them together and the left arm goes slightly above your right would be what it looked like to me.  so then the two white lights are now vertical and the ship looks like it morphed into a tube.  one white light at top and bottom and its all illuminated blue in the middle, there may have been softer faint white lights in the middle. it begins to float away with crooked movement, it seemed like the tube bent a little bit in the middle for a second. it floated up and moved east very slowly behind the trees.  total viewing time is approximately 2 minutes. 

i was shocked, scared, and totally excited at the same time.

i got in my car and tried to follow it, but i never saw it after it went behind the trees.  i did see a black helicopter moving very fast towards the direction of my sighting.
content.summary: Blue boomerang hovering over alamo

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard and looking at the stars, when i saw 2 objects moving very slow north east, one was in front of the other. if you put your pinkie up to the sky that is about the distance apart from each other. i first notice them by just looking up and saw them when they were almost over my head. i thought they were ufo's, satilites are usually more apart from each other  and side by side or close to that, plus they were moving to slow.
the objects were small and were very high and look oval and dark gray. at first they were moving north east at a slow pace and then they made a slow turn to the east. 
not much on these because they were so high i didn't think they could see my flaslight and also they didn't have any lights on or running lights either one.
it just went out of sight.
i looked at my phone to see what time it was and it was 9:46pm pacific time, but i didn't look intill about 10 minutes after they were gone approxmently.
content.summary: 2 small object one following the other.

content.detailedDescription: For 2 nights this week, including tonight, my wife and i were sitting outside on our back porch looking at the sky when my wife noticed an object about the size of a large star moving north in a straight line across the sky.  we looked at it each night with my binoculars and noted initially that it looked blurry.  however, nothing else we observed was blurry.  it was therefore not the binoculars; it was the object.  it appeared to have a strange aura.  tonight i thought it looked like the top of a jellyfish--round, transparent--or perhaps the top of a parachute.  it was not an aircraft or a bird or insect.  it was not a balloon or plastic bag.  it held a steady course, moving faster than such wind-blown objects. we could come up with no reasonable, logical, natural explanation for what we witnessed.  it flew across the sky in a straight line with no sound or deviation of movement--just a strange fuzzy aura around it. it eventually flew out of view. i told my wife i would go online tonight and see if i could find anyone else who may have seen such an object.  sure enough, i did see a few online descriptions of "flying jellyfish."  however, this object had no tentacles or appendages hanging beneath its basic round structure.  with the binoculars, i got the impression that it may have had several seams radiating from its center toward the perimeter, like an umbrella. in fact, the round edge may have been more like an umbrella than a perfect circle.  strange to see this thing twice in one week.  we were both left baffled and bewildered.
content.summary: A round whitish transparent object moved across the sky 2 nights this week..

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing on my front porch, at around 12:30 - 1am smoking a cigarette. i was looking up at the stars, which i usually do every night. 
then out of nowhere i noticed what looked like a star moving at a really high altitude, moving really fast with a dim trail behind it, then it abrubtly changed direction, and then it just was gone like the lights were turned off.
 i was amazed i spend countless nights looking at the sky and the stars. it was the first time i have ever seen anything like it. i knew that it wasn't normal the second i saw it change direction the way it did and the speed it seemed to be moving at compared to the extremely high altitude was incredible.
content.summary: Seen at a really high alt

content.detailedDescription: This event was a long time ago but i never reported it. i am reporting it now because i want to find out more about what happened perhaps from someone who witnessed the same or similar event. i don't even know the exact date or year but it was summer between 1981-1983 at a jamestown va camp ground. i had been injured on a dock and had a large piece of wood removed from my foot. between the pain and my father and brother's snoring, i left the tent and i went to sit in the van. i was in the driver's seat with the engine off. i noticed a yellow streak moving through the woods probably 100 yards away. i could not tell what it was. it was moving quickly and disappeared into the woods. then a yellow glowing orb probably 4 feet in diameter came from my left out of the woods traveling about 30-40 miles an hour. it was dodging trees and swerving through the campground and crossed right in front of the van in plain view. it moved from my left to my right and streaked into the woods beyond where i could see through the trees. i was mostly paralyzed with fear but i scanned the surrounding area to see if i could spot it or another one. i could see another orb maybe 200-300 yards away but not much detail. just a fast moving glow. i lost sight of the third orb again obstructed by the woods and distance. for about 3-4 minutes nothing else happened. my attention was then drawn to the sky and i saw what looked to be a very large glowing yellow ball. it wasn't possible tell how big it was or how far away it was but it appeared to be about 1/2 the size of the sun. i stared at the object for about a minute and then i saw 4-5 yellow orbs rise from the surrounding areas and zoom right into the larger object in the sky. after 10-20 seconds the larger orb seemed to almost just blink out and disappear although i got the sense that it moved so quickly that what i saw was a bit of an optical illusion as it departed.
content.summary: Several yellow orbs observed, one only a few feet in front of me. returned to another object.

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a smoke and witness 3 orb like glows going in a circle pattern, i thought to myself that this was cool to watched so i grabbed my video camera to see if i could video capture it
content.summary: Very odd

content.detailedDescription:
About 9:50 to 10:00 pm, saturday night (sept. 7) my son and i went outside. i walked out onto my driveway and noticed a bright light in the northern sky. i mentioned to my son, who was still under the carport, that there's a bright light up in the sky. after i said it, the light faded out or ascended. my son didn't see it.It did not move in any direction, just looked like it ascended or faded off. the light was about as bright as a planet. this is the 3rd time i've seen this. the first time was 2 summers back, about 7:00 pm and the second sighting was last october, around 10:00 pm, all were in the same location in the sky. a few details about my house: the front faces west, there are a lot of commercial aircraft that fly over, the space shuttle used to fly over when it landed in florida, and i've seen the iss fly over (i get an update from nasa on my iphone when its due to fly over). just wondering what you may think of this. thanks,
charles irwin
content.summary: Bright, star-like in the northern sky. observed for less than a minute, then it faded out or ascended

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 9-02-2013, my fianc���e and i were outside looking into the sky at different directions. i was facing the east to see if i could spot anything unusual. i seen what looked like a star barely moving at extremely high altitude. suddenly it took off at enormous speed. it went on a south eastern coarse. was not a plane, meteor, or satellite. after it disappeared, my fianc���e said, "what is that!?" i turned around and seen three extremely huge white lights. the ufo was hovering then started to move at a speed that even a single prop engine plane could not stay air born. it slightly descended behind our viewpoint behind the trees. there was no sound at all, or any emissions from an exhaust. when my fianc��� first seen it, she said that she could see the lights and shape of the aircraft. after i seen it, i could only see the lights. it slightly descended and we could no longer see it because of the trees. we were both shocked and amazed from what we seen, and she kept asking me at the time of the event, "what does this mean?". she looks into the sky more often. myself, i feel very compelled to look more than i ever have. i can't get this out of my mind. i have to know what this was and i know from experience that this was not a plane, blimp, helicopter, or anything man made. it was not a planet or anything of that nature. this was to big to be a plane that was barely moving. i've done some research since this happened and found out that this is not the first time this has happened in our county. i need to know what this is! please contact me by the phone number that i have provided you with in the info required for this report?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo came from sw. slightly hovered and turned to head northerly direction.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were taking a walk around our courtyard. i looked up at the stars, as i always do, when i observed red light coming across the sky (direction ne to sw). i, at first, thought it was a helicopter but it made no noise and the light was not flashing. my wife and i stood and watched to see where it was going or what it was going to do when it stopped, just hovered, and then moved back and forth a bit. i couldnt believe it. i looked around for anyone who might be out walking so they could see it as well but no one was around. as we watched, my wife thought the orb was getting smaller but i remarked that no, it was moving straight up and away from us, very fast. we stood and watched as it got smaller and smaller and then just disappeared.
content.summary: Round red light with slight white glow around outside edge

content.detailedDescription: I was about 7 yrs old and shared a room with my older brother.His bed was by the window.One night he told me to come look out the window and he sounded scared.What we both saw was something that was solid white and round.It moved slowly in a straight path and disappeared or jumped at light speed to another part of the sky.It moved a little faster in a different direction and this time it almost seemed to skip like a stone on water.It jumped again to another position,moved in a new direction and then it was just gone.Its hard to say if it just disappeared or just traveled at the speed of light .I remember this moment like it was yesterday.When we tried to tell everyone of course it was gone and no one took us seriously.
content.summary: I watched it disappear. it reappeared in a different path and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was just arriveing home whenwe got out of the truck i commented on a star that was changeing colors when i saw something rectangular and rather large moveing very fast in a straight line almost directly over head it was totally silent we watched it fly directly over us at 1500ft or more it was a dull brownish color  the first thing that came to mind was a  gigantic thunderbird but i could see well enough to see no head tail or body and was far to large to be any bird it was almost a perfect rectangle with some verticle and symetrically spaced lines running straight down the width of the object  when seen from directly underneath as it went straight over head this thing was rock soild in its structure and flight path and again was moveing far to fast and large to be an animal also no wind what so ever an eagle or even the fastest hawk diveing at terminal velocity wouldnt have matched its speed as we watched it for only six seconds as it flew directly over head and  was quickly out of sight we were dumbfounded at what we were seeing something you dont really experience maybe once in a lifetime if your lucky.Ive added a sketch as good as possible with a paint program
content.summary: My girlfriend and i arrived home and as we got out of the truck i commented on a star that was changeing colors and i immediatly saw something large and moveing fast and in a straight line almost directly over head was totally silent with no lights

content.detailedDescription:
Before i begin to explain my very 1st sighting i want to let you know that i once tried to report this sighting to mufon but i was still 17 at the time & needed consent from my parents, now i'm 20. so now i can explain my report  without any age problems.

also the photos i provided are of the exact location. i found the closest example of how the diamond craft i saw looked like & putting it in some of the  positions if hovered pass, also the craft i saw is about double the size of what i've shown in the video, this craft was so massive that as it hovered above me it took up the entire night sky, i could not see any light coming from the moon, only light i saw was coming from the bottom of the craft. with that being said i can begin my very 1st sighting.


april 19th, 2010. i sneaked out of the house on this night & walked a few miles to my friends house. around 11 at night i began to walk back home.
i'm on dean road surrounded by dense florida forest on both sides.
i'm walking on the side of a dangerous road with many fast moving cars driving. i'm on the right side of the road as i begin to walk the bridge location shown in pictures. 

first thing i noticed before i even saw the craft a faint sound from the north east coming closer & closer. this sound sounded like some strange type of radar or tracking device it had a rhythm to it which very much got my attention, so while walking i keep on looking above the tree line when i finally see something large slowly hovering above the tree line you see in the photo which my guess would be 20 feet or less from the bridge in which i was walking on so this became such a very close distance  ufo sighting that very quickly i knew exactly what this was cause i could see everything in such factual detail.

so now the object is still slowly hovering, still making that faint radar sound yet i could not hear any type of engine, what i heard was a very faint sound that i could also feel. my theory is what i felt was gravity/air being pushed down against me, remember how close this sighting is, hence why i could feel the hover craft at work. it took a good 15-20 seconds for the craft to fully reveal its full size which i have stated before it was massive. this very much felt like what could be a mothership.

at this time cars driving by were honking at me cause all they saw me doing was looking straight up in the sky without looking at the road cause this too precious to not keep my eyes on it. also i feel that most cars driving may not have seen this craft. not sure on that part.

so now we are at the next 45 seconds where the craft is in full view still slowly hovering above me taking up the entire night sky, like i said before i could not see the moonlight what so ever, so use the picture of the location as a reference to the size, imagine the entire sky being taken up, truly massive & mesmerizing.

the all black massive diamond shaped craft had many random blinking lights in random locations & random colors ranging from the ones i checked out before. still the craft hovering slowly above me & the bridge, still hearing the radar sounds & hearing & feeling the air being pushed down by the hovering device. i begin to run a bit to stay in sight as the craft begins to hover away to the treeline on the left of the location i showed. 

now is when im off the bridge & on grass as the craft is now over the treeline to my left getting further & further away while i hear the radar sound & very faint hovering getting further away. i am beyond jaw dropped yet totally understand what just happened, me coming from puerto rico a huge hot spot for ufo activity, my dad has seen many in pr & my older brother was abducted by greys in pr too, i know this is off topic but i have to say this, about my brother, after his abduction he noticed a small metal object in his skin, he showed me as a kid & till this day still has it on his arm... ok now back to my 1st sighting.

by this point i can not see the craft anymore but still can hear the radar until it all is out of sight. by this point my entire life had changed right in front of me, it was like experiencing a science fiction movie & i'm a science fiction writer so this experience plus the ones that followed with the next 2 years after this give me... lots of experience on the subject. 

now something very strange that relates to this sighting & my next sighting which strangely enough happened exactly 1 year after the event i just explained, i will explain my 2nd sighting since it was very brief.

april 19th, 2011
at a friends house in their backyard. all my friends were drinking & doing keg stands, i do not drink at all, so i'm entirely sober while everyone is entirely drunk, loud & not aware at all of the night sky. me on the other hand is just looking up in the sky cause by this point in my life this something i would do regularly, always keeping an eye on the sky.

so during the time it takes for a keg stand is how fast this far away star/orb like all blue in color craft quickly hovers into my view of the night sky making such impossible sharp turns, in comparison to a bee or dragonfly flying how they just fly here, there or anywhere. so this is exactly what this craft did within the 10-15 second keg stand. the craft came in & out of view within this short time hovering in such a fast manor.

then they finished doing the keg stand for the host of the party while everyone cheering & very drunk i'm there still looking at the sky just in case it comes back into view... i told my friends later that night & they thought i was crazy, they all know about my 1st sighting, this is when i noticed that days date, april 19th, 2011. this is when i noticed the 1 year difference between both sightings. i'm not suggesting that these two crafts are the same one cause they are not. both craft varied in its qualities. it's very strange how my first 2 sightings occurred 1 year apart, for the sightings that followed those were 6 months to a year after this event. 

so now i leave off on this sighting report, i know it is very late, i tried reporting sometime after the 1st sighting happened & had complications cause of my age at the time that i didn't want to deal with.

i will try & post my other sightings very soon. these others sightings are just as strange.
content.summary: An intense close up sighting of a diamond shaped craft slowly hovering above the tree line, silent with many blinking colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Was setting here drinking coffee and heard the noise.  having seen 3 black triangulars years ago, i went out on the deck to investigate.  sure enough, two black triangulars, flying northeast over my property; pretty high in the sky.  they were moving slowly; and not flying fast at all.  their propulsion sounded like a rumble, and they had flashing lights on each corner of them.


i never have a camera when these things happen, but that makes 5 black triangulars i have seen in the past 10 years.
content.summary: Two black triangulars, flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: In christchurch, new zealand i was observing a star then realized it was too bright to be a start and was slowly moving. it was too slow to be a plane or a meteorite but it was slowly moving and the brightness kept changing at times. we had thunder and lightning that night but it had not hit us it was still a about an hour away. but in the distance we could see lightning and it looked purple near the object. then after a while it had rainbow colored rays shining out. eventually it traveled out of sight. i don't know what it was but it was different to anything else i've ever seen.
content.summary: Looked like a star but very bright was moving slowly saw this light for about 30 minutes it had rainbow colour rays shining out of it was differen't to anything else i've ever seen in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my bike on my way home entering the town of clarendon hills when i saw way off in the distance a small looking plane that looked like it was moving and staying stationary at the same time and for sure it didn't look like it was leaving the area quick enough like a normal plane. so i kept my eyes on the sky as i continued home. sometimes i would get a break in the trees and see a plane and wonder if that was it. i was alongside the tracks at one point when i was looking more and saw a plane not moving fast enough wondering if that was still it and so i got off my bike and pulled out my iphone and started to record but i couldn't see anything as i was recording because it was gone. but as i got into my driveway i was looking up some more and that's when i saw a object moving too slow so i ran into the house and grabbed my camera and ran into the backyard and the thing was there off in a distance and i started video taping it. it was pitch dark outside exactly 8:15pm when i first started recording and i had to stick my camera on zoom to help see it. i video taped it! only the lights show in the videos. i stood there watching this thing slowly fly around for about 35 minutes. basically it looked like it was staying in about a square mile since i was able to watch it so long. a few times it drifted off out of sight for a minute or so but came write back to the area. i couldn't see the color or size or shape in the darkness but i could tell it was small and didn't appear to have wings. i pictured it being rectangle shape or a little rounded since i could hardly see it. at one point it got pretty close like two houses down from me. i felt like it saw me. it was a little lower than a helicopter. i think it made a really low sound that reminded me of a hot air balloon sound or plane sound but was much more quiet. it had 4 lights on it and 3 were white and one was red. all the lights were in the front lined up and the red light was a  above the white lights. the lights were blinking like planes do. i was sure it saw me with how close it got. i was thinking it was a drone. i got tired of watching it after a while and went back inside while it was still out there. i didn't feel scared. i am the same person from case #49609. this is the 2nd ufo i have ever witnessed in my life.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small thing with 4 lights slowly flying around

content.detailedDescription: One ufo sightings take places
content.summary: Flyings acyer dind see one in time 8:98

content.detailedDescription: We have an expansive view over nichols passage in se alaska. my wife, and i were sitting at home watching tv on september 7th, 2013, 9:25 pm when i noticed a bright light, like a fireball to the se dropping through the cloud layer at 4,000 feet approx, a nightly vigil watching the alaska airlines jet on final approach to ketchikan international airport. only this light was the wrong color, brighter and traveling too fast. i said to my wife, cheri, get my cell phone and take a picture of this thing, as i went outside to get a better look with binoculars. this object which looked to me to be traveling at around 500-600 mph at 4000 feet and 3-4 miles distant from my location, it made a slow left turn at blank point and flew west down the tongass narrows over the airport and disappeared. my wife was going back in the house when i said wait, there's another one coming! i watched the second one with binoculars following the same flight path that all aircraft using iff use, (bushnell 10x 50's). it appeared to be a glowing disk of plasma- or like churning molten metal with 6 white lights rotating around this "molten" disk in a rapid pulse pattern, extremely bright. i did not see the third ufo that my wife saw following the second ufo because i was looking through binoculars limiting my field of vision watching the second ufo up close for approx 10 seconds. they made no sound. our location gets every sound bounced off the mountains by aircraft and boats and these ufo's made no sound at all. they all disappeared as the first, into thin air or into the cloud cover. i'm a professional artist and registered guide, a trained observer. i have no reference in my experience of 56 years to compare this to.
content.summary: Saw 3 glowing disks follow each other, the first followed by two close together about 30 seconds behind the first which followed approximately the path of local jet traffic would use for a se approach to the airport

content.summary: Two strange light that do not fit the night sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Leaving los angeles to ride down to carlsbad on the motorcycle, friday night around 8pm. heading east on the 101 fwy, around the echo park area, i just had the urge to look up to my right. i often look up at the sky while riding at night watching the lights from helicopters, plans, blimps, stars etc, and there are many helicopters over the la sky at night.  but what i saw was definitely none of the above. three bright white lights in a triangle formation, or v shape with a red light in the center rear. i couldn't see the shape of the craft, just the lights forming the shape. it looked stationary as i stared at it for about 4 seconds which is a long time while on a bike. immediately i knew it was not normal. i had to face the freeway, so took my eyes of the lights. i thought quickly, what the hell? that's definitely not a blimp which would be the only thing similar, but not really. i looked up again.  a few trees blocked my view as they whizzed by. then clear sky and no lights. i looked all around in the area. it was facing east direction, but to me looked stationary, i checked the fwy again, straight road, traffice moving steady and safely so i literally turned about face eastward with a clear view of the sky and still nothing. just gone. no where in sight. after determining it had gone i focused back on the ride knowing i had definitely seen what i had seen and it was, in my best judgment, an extra terrestrial craft in a v or triangle shape. please feel free to contact me. much thanks for your hard work. paul.
content.summary: Looked up while riding motorcyle on 101fwy. saw three white lights triangle formation one red light at center rear. looked at fwy then up again. lights gone. looked all around. they just vanished???

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 4th night the moving/sparkly stars are here!
again same area behind my back door.  i looked tonight
at 8 pm just to see if they were out!  it was kind of cloudy,
gloomy - saw them faintly but few red lights ..

after dark i was out and found them to east and west.
seem so many!  same thing as last night just
wanted to report it again.

this triangle is still above my house!  why are they staying
long like this?  you all list short time and they seem to just be staying at night!  since i first saw it i look every night!!!

really feeling like i"m in a movie!  (not a good one)
i went out - sparkling stars - triangles.

i noted something tho - twice is was kind of greyish sky - 
no moon.  then this cloud came in that look like they do in the day time. not the ones that reflect behind the stars.  the open sky - just looking like you would in the day.  i don't remember seeing clouds like this at night!  but i'm so confused because i know i am seeing this. others in my area are.
this is the 4th night and going on 3 hours.  why do they like this area so much!  how long did it go on before i noticed?  wish someone could tell me what is going on. i have an idea - idk i just want to know something. i feel very just freaked out kind of.  4 nights and i am not just checking once!  i do go out and in - so i can give my eyes a break!

so - again tonight and still here now!
content.summary: 4th night in a row!  stars that flash red and white.  saw at least 2-3 triangles!  saw some that look like shooting stars.  can see behind clouds!!!  no moon!

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo, that i reported, last night near the same spot too.

i went out to my front porch around 8:30pm to smoke a butt and last night i saw a ufo that seemed like it was very similar if not the same ufo. last night i saw a ufo that was doing the same thing so i was looking for a ufo tonight. it wasn't in the same spot tonight, it was a little higher and up to the left but i knew to look tonight too and there it was. it was like the brightest "star" in the sky except it was moving like doing a little dance. you really had to look at it to see it moving but it was moving up and down and to the left and to the right, it was doing little circles and spirals too. it wasn't a star because the other real stars were not moving at all and the real stars were not as bright. it wasn't an airplane because airplanes don't dance around and it didn't look anything like the airplanes that i saw later after the ufo went out of sight because of clouds i think. 

so last night i showed my mother that ufo that i reported to you guys yesterday and she noticed that it was moving around too. so tonight my mother was home again and i showed her the ufo that i saw tonight and again she noticed that it too was moving or dancing around in the sky. 

i remember yesterday that it was flashing too but not anything like an airplane. i don't know how to describe it because it was a little subtle so i won't, but stars don't blink like the ufo i saw did. 

the reason why i stopped watching it was because it got really dim and then i couldn't see it at all maybe because of clouds, but at first i could see it really good. 

this definitely looked like the same ufo that i saw yesterday but i can't prove it. it wasn't at the same spot as the one i saw yesterday but pretty close because both times i watched it from my front porch and it was close but not exactly the same spot, but they were both moving around slowly anyways.

i was thinking about calling the police but i didn't. i just wanted someone to get it on video. maybe the ufo will be in my city tomorrow too but i wont hold my breath but i'm going to look for it again. but it was definitely dancing or bouncing around in place.

thanks.
content.summary: It looked like the brightest star in the sky but it was "dancing" around in place.
